InteractionRelatedAccount.name: InteractionRelatedAccount
InteractionRelatedAccount.description: Represents a junction between an interaction and account that's related to that interaction.

AccountId.description: The account of a company that's associated with the interaction.

AccountRole.description: Specifies the role of the account in the interaction.

Comment.description: The description about the account that's associated with the interaction.

InteractionId.description: The interaction associated with the account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the account that's related to the interaction.
